SELECT TO_CHAR(FECHA_OPERACION,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:MI AM') AS "fechaTransaccion", OPERACION AS "operacion", USUARIO AS "usuario", COMENTARIO AS "comentario" FROM PAPELES_BITACORA WHERE FECHA_OPERACION BETWEEN :pFechaInicial AND :pFechaFinal+0.9999
UNION
SELECT TO_CHAR(FECHA_INGRESO,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:MI AM'), 'CARGA DE FORMATO', USUARIO_INGRESO, '(1) CODIGO: '||CODIGO||' (2) VERSION '||VERSION ||' (3) NOMBRE: '||NOMBRE FROM PAPELES_FORMATO WHERE VERSION >0 AND FECHA_INGRESO BETWEEN :pFechaInicial AND :pFechaFinal+0.9999 ORDER BY 1
SELECT DESTINATARIO AS "destinatario", CUERPO AS "cuerpo", FORMATO_HTML AS "formatoHtml", ASUNTO AS "asunto" FROM IPT_NOTIFICACION WHERE CODIGO=:pCodigo

SELECT VISTA."anioFiscal" AS "anioFiscal", VISTA."nit" AS "nit", VISTA."nombre" AS "nombre", VISTA."email" AS "email", VISTA."direccion" AS "direccion" FROM ( SELECT VISTA_ANEXO."anioFiscal", VISTA_ANEXO."nit", VISTA_ANEXO."nombre", VISTA_ANEXO."valorCampo", VISTA_ANEXO."email", VISTA_ANEXO."direccion", MAX(VISTA_ANEXO."declaro")AS "declaro", MAX(VISTA_ANEXO."fecha") AS "fecha" FROM IPT_CUMPLIMIENTO_ANEXO_MV VISTA_ANEXO WHERE VISTA_ANEXO."anioFiscal" < :pPeriodo and VISTA_ANEXO."anioFiscal" >= 2015 and substr(nvl(vista_anexo.afiliacion_isr_status, ' '), 1, 1) <> 'I' /* 30/11/2022 Ticket#10000060915 no notificar contribuyentes con afiliaciÃ³n ISR inactiva */ GROUP BY VISTA_ANEXO."nit", VISTA_ANEXO."nombre", VISTA_ANEXO."anioFiscal", VISTA_ANEXO."valorCampo",VISTA_ANEXO."direccion", VISTA_ANEXO."email" ORDER BY "declaro" desc,"fecha" ) VISTA WHERE VISTA."declaro"='NO' AND VISTA."valorCampo"=1 AND VISTA."fecha" = (SELECT MAX(pp."fecha") FROM IPT_CUMPLIMIENTO_ANEXO_MV pp WHERE pp."nit"= VISTA."nit" AND pp."anioFiscal" =VISTA."anioFiscal")

SELECT C.NIT AS "nit", C.EMAIL AS "email" FROM BA_CONTRATOS_DE C WHERE C.NIT IN (SELECT "nit" FROM IPT_CUMPLIMIENTO_ANEXO_MV WHERE "declaro"='NO' AND "email" IS NULL) AND C.EMAIL != 'NOTIENE' AND C.EMAIL !='No Especificado' AND C.STATUS = 'A' AND C.NUMERO_CONTRATO = (SELECT MAX(NUMERO_CONTRATO) FROM BA_CONTRATOS_DE WHERE NIT = C.Nit AND EMAIL!= 'NOTIENE' AND C.EMAIL !='No Especificado' AND STATUS = 'A')

SELECT NIT_USUARIO AS "nit", EMAIL AS "email" FROM SAT_EN_LINEA_SOLICITUDES S WHERE NIT_USUARIO IN (SELECT "nit" FROM IPT_CUMPLIMIENTO_ANEXO_MV WHERE "declaro"='NO' AND "email" IS NULL) AND ID_SOLICITUD = (SELECT MAX(ID_SOLICITUD) FROM SAT_EN_LINEA_SOLICITUDES WHERE NIT_USUARIO= S.NIT_USUARIO) AND NIT_USUARIO NOT IN (SELECT C.NIT AS "nit" FROM BA_CONTRATOS_DE C WHERE C.NIT IN (SELECT "nit" FROM IPT_CUMPLIMIENTO_ANEXO_MV WHERE "declaro"='NO' AND "email" IS NULL) AND C.EMAIL != 'NOTIENE' AND C.EMAIL !='No Especificado' AND C.STATUS = 'A' AND C.NUMERO_CONTRATO = (SELECT MAX(NUMERO_CONTRATO) FROM BA_CONTRATOS_DE WHERE NIT = C.Nit AND EMAIL!= 'NOTIENE' AND C.EMAIL !='No Especificado' AND STATUS = 'A'))
